title: Services announced for Solomon Caesar, gospel singer and brother of Pastor Shirley Caesar

Services announced for Solomon Caesar, gospel singer and brother of Pastor Shirley Caesar
Tuesday, September 19, 2017 13:28

Gospel Music Fever™ Service information has been announced for gospel singer Solomon Caesar, who passed September 12.
